casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

November, 1945.

(November 14, 1945.) E. Phillip Crowell et al., as Trustees of School District No. 6 of the Town of Salina, Respondents, v. Town of Salina, Appellant.

Same decision and like cause of action as in companion case of Buchanan v. Town of Salina (270 App. Div. 207). Present — Taylor, P. J., Dowling, McCum, Larkin and Love, JJ. [See 270 App. Div. 800.]
